thread.title: Robin Hood Reboot Pushed for 'Kingsman 2' Shoot
thread.title_full: Robin Hood Reboot Pushed for 'Kingsman 2' Shoot

title: Robin Hood Reboot Pushed for 'Kingsman 2' Shoot
text:
Robin Hood Reboot Pushed for 'Kingsma... Robin Hood Reboot Pushed for 'Kingsman 2' Shoot Next Story Prev Story 8 hrs ago   
The rising star, who broke through with the Matthew Vaughn -directed comic book adaptation Kingsman: The Secret Service , had been caught between the dueling schedules of Liongate's Robin Hood reboot and Kingsman 2 . The latter had been distributed by Fox but was produced and financed by Vaughn and his MARV Films banner.
